data.system_settings: Samsung Galaxy S8 (SM-G950F), Android Nougat 7.0 and Windows 10 Home 64-bit v1703
data.actual_result: The user's avatar flashes, not an instance of lazy loading because the information was already on screen
data.expected_result: The user's animated avatar should not flash and the user details should just be updated with the user's new role
data.short_description: The animated avatar of a user with Nitro flashes when they receive a role
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to a server you have the Manage Roles permission for - Open the profile of a Nitro user with an animated avatar on mobile - Wait for the user's profile to fully load - Give the user a role on desktop
